name: The Adventures of Batman & Robin
overview: Robin & Commissioner Gordon have mysteriously disappeared, and Batman suspects kidnapping. Have our two comrades succumb to the deadly beauty of Poison Ivy? Does the Riddler know the answer? Or will The Joker have the last laugh? Tune in, one Sega CD to find out! • Play like you're in the TV series with exclusive animation from the creators of "The Adventures of Batman & Robin!" • Two games in one! Cruise for criminals in the Batmobile or take to the night skies in the Batwing. • Incredible scaling 3D graphics make every enemy and obstacle leap off the screen!
